trans-unit.source: User login
Enter your username and password here in order to log in on the website:
trans-unit.target: Vnesi uporabniško ime in geslo tukaj, da se prijaviš na spletni strani:

trans-unit.source: You have logged out.
You just logged out from your user session on this website. You can login again or as another user by the form below.
trans-unit.target: Pravkar si se odjavil iz svoje uporabniške seje na tej spletni strani. Lahko se prijaviš ponovno ali kot drug uporabnik z spodnjim obrazcem.

trans-unit.source: Login failure

An error occurred during login. Most likely you didn't enter the username or password correctly. Be certain that you enter them precisely as they are, including upper/lower case. Another possibility is that cookies might be disabled in your web browser.
trans-unit.target: Prišlo je do napake pri prijavi. Verjetno nisi vnesel pravilnega uporabniškega imena ali gesla. Bodi pozoren da ju vneseš natanko tako kot sta, vključeno z velikimi in malimi črkami. Možnost je tudi da imaš onemogočene piškotke v tvojem spletnem brskalniku.

trans-unit.source: Login successful
You are now logged in as '###USER###'
Current status
This is your current status:

Warning: There is a possibility that cookies are not enabled in your web browser! If your login disappears on your next click that is the case and you should enable cookies (or accept cookies from this website) immediately!
trans-unit.target: Opozorilo: Mogoče nimaš omogočenih piškotkov v tvojem spletnem brskalniku! Če prijavni formular izgine ob tvojem naslednjem kliku, potem omogoči piškotke (ali pa sprejmi piškotke iz te spletne strani) nemudoma!

trans-unit.source: Username:
Password:
Login
Stay logged in:
Logout
Send password
Reset Password
Change your password
Please enter your new password twice. Password needs a minimum length of %s chars.
trans-unit.target: Prosim vnesi svoje geslo dvakrat. Geslo mora biti dolgo najmanj %s znakov.

trans-unit.source: Error: there is no prefix for the link. Please set one of the following in your typoscript template: plugin.tx_felogin_pi1.feloginBaseURL = http://yourdomain/, config.baseURL = http://yourdomain/, config.absRelPrefix = http://yourdomain/
trans-unit.target: Napaka: predpona za povezavo ne obstaja. Prosim nastavi eno izmed sledečih v tvoji typoscript predlogi:plugin.tx_felogin_pi1.feloginBaseURL = http://tvojadomena/, config.baseURL = http://tvojadomena/, config.absRelPrefix = http://tvojadomena/

trans-unit.source: The link you clicked is not valid. Please repeat the forgot message procedure.
trans-unit.target: Povezava ki si jo kliknil ni veljavna. Prosim ponovi proceduro pozabljenega gesla.

trans-unit.source: The passwords are not equal, please enter your new password twice. Password needs a minimum length of %s chars.
trans-unit.target: Gesli se ne ujemata, prosim vnesi svoje novo geslo dvakrat. Geslo mora biti dolgo najmanj %s znakov.

trans-unit.source: The password length is too short. Please enter your new password twice. Password needs a minimum length of %s chars.
trans-unit.target: Geslo je prekratko. Prosim vnesi svoje novo geslo dvakrat. Geslo mora biti dolgo najmanj %s znakov.

trans-unit.source: Your password has been saved. You can now login with your new password.
trans-unit.target: Tvoje geslo je bilo uspešno shranjeno. Sedaj se lahko prijaviš z svojim novim geslom.

trans-unit.source: Change your password
Enter new password
Repeat new password
Your email:
Forgot your password?

Your password Hi %s
Your username is "%s" Your password is "%s"
trans-unit.target:
Tvoje geslo Pozdravljen %s
Tvoje uporabniško ime je "%s" Tvoje geslo je "%s"

trans-unit.source:
Your password Hi %s
We couldn't find a username for this email address and so cannot send the password to you. Probably you misspelled the email address (upper/lower case makes a difference) or maybe you even didn't register yet?
trans-unit.target:
Tvoje geslo Pozdravljen %s
Nismo našli uporabniškega imena za ta email in ti ne moremo poslati gesla. Verjetno si se zmotil pri vnašanju email naslova (male in velike črke so pomembne) ali pa še se nisi registriral?

trans-unit.source:
Your new password Dear %s,
This email was sent in response to your request to reset your password. Please click on the link below. %s
For security reasons, this link is only active until %s. If you do not visit the link before then, you will need to repeat the password reset steps.
trans-unit.target:
Tvoje novo geslo Pozrdavljen %s,
ta email je bil poslan kot odgovor na tvojo zahtevo za ponastavitev tvojega gesla. Prosim klikni na spodnjo povezavo. %s
Zaradi varnosti je povezava aktivna samo do %s. Če ne obiščeš povezave pred tem, potem boš moral ponoviti zahtevo za ponastavitev gesla.

trans-unit.source: Please enter the email address by which you registered your user account. Then press "Send password" and your password will immediately be emailed to you. Make sure to spell your email address correctly.
trans-unit.target: Prosim vnesi email naslov z katerim si registriral svoj uporabniški račun. Nato pritisni "Pošlji geslo" in tvoje geslo bo nemudoma poslano na tvoj email naslov. Email naslov moraš vnesti pravilno.

trans-unit.source: Your password has now been sent to the email address %s
trans-unit.target: Tvoje geslo je bilo poslano na %s email naslov

trans-unit.source: Please enter your username or email address. Instructions for resetting the password will be immediately emailed to you.
trans-unit.target: Prosim vnesi tvoje uporabniško ime ali email naslov. Navodila za ponastavitev gesla bomo nemudoma poslali na tvoj email naslov.

trans-unit.source: An email has been sent to the address stored in your account and contains a link to reset your password. If you do not receive an email, your account or email address was not found.
trans-unit.target: Email je bil poslan na naslov shranjen v tvojem računu in vsebuje povezave za ponastavitev tvojega gesla. Če ne prejmeš emaila, potem tvoj račun ali email naslov ni bil najden.

trans-unit.source: Your account or email address does not exist.
trans-unit.target: Tvoj račun ali email naslov ne obstaja.

trans-unit.source: Return to login form
Username or email address:
Url "%s" for redirect was not accepted!
trans-unit.target: Povezava "%s" za preusmeritev ni bila sprejeta!

trans-unit.source: Url "%s" contained an XSS attack and was cleaned!
trans-unit.target: Povezava "%s" je vsebovala XSS napad in je bila očiščena!
